invalidVisibilityConfiguration.public: Because you are creating a public collection, all recipes must be public. The following recipes are not public: {{violatingRecipes, list}}
invalidVisibilityConfiguration.unlisted: Because you are creating an unlisted collection, all recipes must be either public or unlisted. The following recipes are private: {{violatingRecipes, list}}

invalidVisibilityConfiguration.public: Because you are making this collection public, all recipes must be public. The following recipes are not public: {{violatingRecipes, list}}
invalidVisibilityConfiguration.unlisted: Because you are making this collection unlisted, all recipes must be either public or unlisted. The following recipes are private: {{violatingRecipes, list}}

delete.title: Delete "{{name}}"
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this collection? This action cannot be undone.
